mapper.sql: SELECT pp.id, pp.poly_id, p.id AS property_id, t.id AS property_item_id, p.column_type AS property_column_type, p.name AS property_name, IF(p.column_type = 3, pp.property_text, t.name) AS property_text FROM base_data_product_poly_property AS pp INNER JOIN base_data_product_property AS p ON p.id = pp.property_id LEFT JOIN base_data_product_property_item AS t ON t.id = pp.property_item_id
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM base_data_product_poly_property WHERE property_id = #{propertyId} AND poly_id NOT IN (SELECT id from base_data_product_poly WHERE category_id = #{categoryId})
mapper.select: WHERE pp.poly_id = #{poly_id} ORDER BY p.code, t.code
WHERE pp.property_id = #{propertyId} ORDER BY p.code, t.code
